original: @171a # // mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga la /
analyzed: @171a # // mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga la /
translated: The ritual for establishing one stūpa

original: las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra /
analyzed: las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra /
translated: The other activities are the same as above.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni khru gang bzhi pa yan chad la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni khru gang bzhi pa yan chad la /
translated: The size of the maṇḍala is at least one cubit.
The height is also one cubit.

original: de'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bri ste /
analyzed: de'i steng du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bri ste /
translated: In the center of that, draw an eight-petaled lotus.

original: de'i dbus su gzhag tsee tya de'i nang du sha ri ram dang rin po che ci 'byor pa yang gzhug go //
analyzed: de'i dbus su gzhag tsee tya de'i nang du sha ri ram dang rin po che ci 'byor pa yang gzhug go //
translated: Place the stūpa in the center of that. Also, place whatever śarīra and jewels are available inside the stūpa.

original: mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga'o//
analyzed: mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga'o//
translated: The ritual for establishing one stūpa.
